Room.Name: Kafkan Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Kafkan Way, running parallel with the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: Kafkan Way is one of the many roads that forms the boundry of the city of Oceancrest. The border along the southeastern corner of Oceancrest is not a straight line, and curves with the rugged landscape. To the west, you can see the intersection with Wakeforest Drive. Kafkan way continues to the east and west.
